segments.advisor_message: Alright, let's talk about your income sources. What do you have coming in right now, like from work or investments?
segments.client_message: Um, well I've got my salary from my job, it’s around four thousand dollars, and I get that, like every month?

segments.advisor_message: Got it, that's good to know. And is that before or after taxes?
segments.client_message: Oh, that's gross... I mean, before tax, haha! I guess I should've mentioned that!

segments.advisor_message: No problem at all! So, any other income sources we should note? Just trying to get the full picture here.
segments.client_message: Actually, I do have some rental income too! It's about a thousand bucks a month from my apartment. No other sources, really, just those two.
